choices: Devin: a boy with the power of a hero
1.content:
1) I would like to give thanks to foxclox for letting me use Lucille the lucario in the "from old to new" storyline and this is my first pokemon story. I might let expansion into the story, but it depends and I still don't know about it so enjoy.

2) Devin is a normal boy till his parents were killed in a car wreck and his family has the power reality manipulation. His best friend, demi will stand by his side as they live their normal lives and she hold a little secret of her own. There is more than one person watching them.

3) I have selected afew rena storylines from nameless one and system crash that will be here and they are my own version of the real storylines.

4) Nando's story

5) Other stories and options.

I have some other storylines to add here and you can add to them.
Inflation is only allowed for the "From old to new" storyline and let me know if you have any ideas to do it.
1.title: Choosing a story to read

11.content:
In a dark room of an orphanage, a pikachu boy was sleeping on his bed and he was dreaming of getting adopting by a family or having a new mother for him to love.

“Why?”

“Why am I here?”

“Why did she put me in this place?”

“Who and where is my father?”

“Did I do something to make her upset?”

“Or will I be here till when I get enough to leave?”

These were going through his mind and he started to cry in his sleep. He has been watching the other children getting adopted and he wished that he was adopted by someone special. He is a good, kind, and sweet; but his mother is not good to him.

Well, we are going to see who will be adopting him, which will be a lucario; but not any lucario, Lucille the lucario. She is neighbor to the boy and his mother, but she loved the boy like he was her own son. Lucille would go see the boy after his mother and she was caught by his mother so that lead to a fight, but the end results was the boy was sent to an orphanage and Lucille was given a warning. She is looking at her chest while thinking about having a kid and Lucille sensed something by using her aura and she will check the orphanage out tomorrow.

“One child is going to be very lucky to have me as their mother and I will be the best mother to them.” she said hugging her chest in a loving way

“Tomorrow will be the day.” she said as getting ready for bed

Lucille had her new day planned out as she went to sleep, smiling.

The boy’s birth mother is smiling because she doesn’t have to watch her son and his father is out of the picture, but she still thinks of her son.

“He was a good son and he was cute when he was born.” She said thinking about her son

She went to get ready for her bath before going to bed.

“Life is good.” she said soaking in the tub

She went to bed as well and she was smiling.

Fate or destiny has a way screwing a person’s life and it’s how they deal with it, but the effects are both good and bad. Tomorrow will be quite a day for some people and it will be a bad day for others. The boy’s name is Kai. Time to look forward to a new day and a good day.
11.title: From old to new

111.content:
The morning light shined through the windows and people started to get up including lucille, kai, and his mother; but this is the day that will be the start of something new. Our three characters are waking up and they are getting ready for the day.

“Will I be adopted today? I hope so.” Kia said as he made his bed before getting a hot shower even though he is an electric mouse, but he will be fine

“Another day, another chance to make some money.” His mother said as she left for work

“Let’s find that special child and give them a good home.” Lucille said as she saw that woman left and went to the orphanage

Lucille was thinking of what she sensed last night and she was also thinking ways to get bigger, but she is only focusing on adopting a child. She is walking down the street to the only orphanage in the city, but she was thinking of what she was told after the trial.

“Miss, I’m glad to hear that you wanted to care for the boy and he could have someone like you.” The judge said to her after everyone has gone

“Yes your Honor.” She said

“A day will be the day for you to adopt the boy after you see that woman left for work and hopefully you will meet his father and he can have a family that truly loves him.” He warned her as she nodded

“I wonder about him and I still need to know some things.” She said as she was walking to the door of the orphanage

Once she was inside, the receptionist spotted her and they started to talk about adopting a child.

“So you want to give one of these children a home?” she asked Lucille

“Yes, I do and I will do what I can to provide the child.”

“Well, we have a selection for you to choose from and all of them need a good home.”

“I understand that all of them need a good home and a family that will care for them.”

They talked till Lucille was given a tour of the orphanage and noticed the children looking at her, but she found all, but one child that she was looking for.

“Miss, is there another child living here?” she asked her

“Yes, but he was the most recent one we have here and he was put here by his mother.”

Lucille stopped and she knew the child that the receptionist was talking about, but the receptionist noticed this.

“Are you alright?”

“Yes, I am; but can you show me where the child is and I will be gladly to give him a good home.” Lucille said as they went to the sleeping quarters for the children

Kai was in his room thinking of his dreams and he didn’t hear the coming footsteps down the hall. He was dressed with the clothes that his mother sent with him and he sitting on his well-made bed as the door opened. He didn’t hear the door opening and closing, but he was pulled into a hug with his sinking into something.

“Today, you will be my son and I will take good care of you.” He heard as he knew the voice

He turned around and he saw lucille next to him; but he just jumped onto her and hugged her.

“You came for me.” He said happily and she hugged him back

“Of course I did, your real mother will have to find out sooner or later.” She said to him as he nodded

They left his room they could fill out the papers for him to be her son for life and he went to collect his things from his room. Soon with the paperwork done, they left the orphanage by taking a cab and they reached home in no time. Kai was looking at his old home before walking inside his new one and she gave him a tour of his new home. Their ranch-style home is a two-story house with a pool in the backyard; the first floor has the living room, kitchen and a minibar next to it; and a storage area for the water heaters and other things. The second floor has three bedrooms, two guestrooms and the other bedroom is for luke and herself.
111.title: Adoption

1111.content:
Lucille gave kai a tour of his new home and she gave him the bedroom closest to her bedroom, but she will be there to help him. Kai started to decorate his new room and lucille helped him with decorating the walls. Soon it was time for lunch so they went downstairs to get something to eat.

“Alright kai, what would you like to eat for lunch?”

He thought for a moment.

“Mac and cheese, please.” He said happily

She nodded and got started working on his lunch, but he helped her and wanted some veggies with his lunch. When it was ready, he was sitting at the table ready to eat and she gave him a glass of milk.

“This is amazing!” he chirped as he was eating his lunch and she ate the rest of the cooked lunch

“Well, thank you.” She smiled and soon as he finished eating he went to sleep

She picked him up in her arms and took him to bed for a nap.

~He had a good day and I need to speak with some friends.~ she thought

Kai was sound asleep as she kissed his head and left the room heading for the phone.

“Who should I call?” she asked herself as she picked her home phone

“Luke, susan, ariel, and mika; but I have to have mika control herself when around kai.” She said

“Oh, I might have to get that nurse blaziken to check on kai.” She quickly thought

“Is luke there?” lucille asked for her boyfriend at his job

“Hey love what do you need?” Luke, the mightyena asked

“I have something that I need to speak with you and my friends.” She said

“Alright I’ll be there after work.” He said as he had to get back to work

She called susan and ariel with the same message, but she was about to call mika she had to be careful.

“Lucille, are you ready to get bigger?” mika asked her

“Mika, I called you about an important matter and I need you to be at my house; but please control your lust.” Lucille said

“Alright and I will behave myself.” Mika said

“Thanks.” Lucille said as she ended the call

“That was easier than I thought.” She said

“Last one.” She said

“Medical General Hospital.” A secretary answered the phone

“I’m looking for a Nurse Blaziken that works at your hospital.”

“That is Helen has the night off and she is at her home sleeping for her next shift.”

The secretary gave lucille the phone number so she could call the nurse herself.

“Hello?” the nurse answered the phone

“Hi, are you Helen the blaziken nurse that works at Medical General?”

“Yes, who is this?”

“My name is lucille.”

“Lucille the lucario?”

“Yep.”

“What do you need?”

“Can you come over to my house and I’ll explain it to you with my friends and boyfriend.”

“Sure.”

Lucille ended the call and sighed before going to see about kai.

“Lu, I still need my stuff from my old room.” Kai said

“We will get it.” She said hugging him and brining him to her chest

“I have a friend from school and she is wondering about me so could I go see her?” he asked her

“Yes, after you meet some people I know.” She said and he nodded

“Okay.” He smiled

They hugged each other and she tickled him till she heard a knock on the door.

“Alright you stay here till I call you, ok?” she asked and he nodded

She kissed him on the forehead before heading to the door and opened to see the gang that she called.

“So what is the thing you want to talk about?” luke asked

“Do you guys remember the pikachu boy next door and his mother sent him to the orphanage in the city?” she asked them

“Yeah the sweet boy and she was hard on him.” Susan said and ariel nodded

“I heard about him at work.” Luke said

“I saw him with his mother on his way to school.” Mika said

“I would see him with a girl at the school when I go to work as well.” Helen said

“Well, last night I sensed something with my aura ability and I went to the orphanage today. I found the boy and I adopted him today.” She explained

“Lu, you have a good heart to do that for him.” Ariel said

“His name is kai.”

She went over to the stairs and called kai down.

“Kai, these are the friends I want you to meet.” Lucille said to him

Mika walked over to kai and bent down to his level.

“Well, it’s a pleasure to meet you kai.” She said as she shook his hand

“My name is Mika.” She added and he nodded

“Hi mika.” He said and she smiled

“We are all friends here.”

Ariel and susan came over to him and hugged him between them.

“You are so very cute.” They said and he smiled

“Thank you.” He said

“I’m Susan.” The arbok said

“And I’m Ariel.” The arcanine said

Luke and the nurse came over as well.

“Hello kai, I’m luke, your mother’s boyfriend.” He shook his hand

“Hi luke.” kai said feeling welcomed

Kai turned to see helen and he smiled.

“Hey Helen.” He said to the nurse

“Kai.”

“How are you doing?” he asked

“Better, but I’m still working hard.”

“Good and I will try my best when I can get back to school.” He said

“Kai, call your friend and let her know that you are coming over.” Lucille said and he went to the phone

“Ok, lu.” He said and called the number

“Is Catherine there?” kai asked

“Hi cat.”

“I do have some good news for you to hear.”

“I was adopted today by my new mother and I want you to guess who.”

“No, it’s not blaze.”

“No, it’s not mika either.”

“It was the lucario next door, I call her lu.”

“Lu is my new mother and I meet some friends of hers.”

“Lu said I could come over after meeting her friends, but I wonder if they could be more of a family to me.”

“I can have someone drop me off at your house soon.” Kai before ending his call and going to his room to get ready for his play date

“He wants a family with us?” susan said surprised

“His mother was hard on him and his father wasn’t around.” Helen said

“I think we can do that for him and find his father.” Mika said

“Yeah, I’ll keep an eye out for him at work.” Luke said

“Alright.” Lucille said

Kai came down ready to leave and susan with ariel hugged him again for being so cute.

“Kai, who is catherine?” lu asked him

“A friend from school.”

“She is a ninetales.”

“She told me about the ninetales’ curse.”

“A ninetales.”

“So who is taking me?” he asked

“I will.” Helen said as he walked over to her

“Luke, you can pick him up when he is ready to leave.” Lu said and he nodded

“What about this family role thing?” mika asked

“Luke could be a father to him or an older brother, you would be a second mother to him, susan and ariel could be older sisters or aunts, and I don’t know about helen.” Lu explained

“So your motherly nature is over powering your desire to be bigger.” Mika said

“You could say that, but kai is more important.”

“Alright I’ll be his other mother.” Mika said smiling

“Or just ask him what he wants to do.” helen said as she came back from dropping him

“He said that he heard what you were planning for him and he was thankful.” She said and lu smiled
1111.title: Meeting new friends

11111.content:
Kai is having a good time with Catherine as his mother and his new friends or his new family were deciding on what do to for fun with him.

“Kai told me that he still needed what left in his old room next door.” Lu said

“She doesn’t know that you adopted kai for now.” Susan said

“I’m going to the judge and see if I can to get him to have her to hand over his things from her home.” She said

“What about kai going to school?” mika asked

“Lu, you and I with Helen can go to his school setup something so he can go to school.” Luke said and they smiled

“While kai is not around, we can get bigger.” Mika said

“I will set up an appointment for kai at the hospital so we can see if he has any medical problems.” Helen said and they nodded

“Yeah, we better make sure that he has no problems.” Ariel said

As they were talking, kai and cat were having fun in her room and they started talking.

“Your former mother won’t be happy with lu being your new mother.” Cat said

“I know, but she was the one to put me in that orphanage and lu got me out.” He said

“I did my best for her and she slap it back at my face.” He added before cat hugged him

It was getting late and kai called lu that we was ready to come home. Soon luke came to the house and picked up kai for lu, but they were walking alone.

“Kai, me and the others are going to try to get you back into school.” Luke said as kai smiled

“Thank you, luke.”

Luke carried kai on his shoulders like a father would for his son and soon they passed by a beauty salon where a certain someone owns the place.

“Kai, you can go inside while lu comes to get you and meet another friend.” Luke said as kai walked into the salon and luke went to get lu for kai

As kai came into the salon, he heard someone said something and he started walking towards the backroom where Randore and her two friends are. 1111111.title: Just Visiting

Wasting no time, Randore casted a growth spell on Lucile, whom began growing by the inch in her curves.

"Oh Randore, you shouldn't have." Cooed Lucile, stroking her figure, reaching 62-16-52 and still growing; Kai turned around and saw Lucille growing right before his eyes before shifting his attention back to Glenda and Sharon. "Wow... I didn't know Lu was into growing, too." Kai said, blushing a little. "Oh, in this neighborhood, a lot of us pokegirls are really into getting big." Glenda replied. "Whether it's for fun, or for being more huggable." Added Sharon, "For those of us that can't fly, even floating through the air when we float." "Ah. I see." No wonder many pokegirls here come out big." He thought to himself, "Come to think of it... maybe I'll make a drink that does something like that back at the Jade Spire tavern."

11111111.title: Lu's quick gift

Lu and kai walked home from the salon and lu was humming to herself and her figure was bouncing along as she walked and kai was holding on to her hand as he walked with her.

“Kai, everyone else left when luke told me to come get you.” Lu said and he nodded

Soon they got home without a certain someone seeing them and they walked upstairs so they could get ready for bed. She had kai take a bath so she could clean him up herself and they splashed water at each other. Kai was clean and wet, but that soon changed when she wrapped a towel around him and started to rub him down good so he would be dry. Kai was putting on his sleep clothes as lu was taking a shower in her bathroom and she was singing in the shower. She picked him up in her arms and carried him to her bedroom and with kai in one arm she got him into the bed before letting herself get into her bed.

Well, that was fun to see; kai got the mother he wanted and lucille got a little bigger. Kai’s mother doesn’t know that kai was adopted by Lucille yet and hopefully it will stay like that. 111111111.title: Later that night

1111111111.content:
Lu woke up to the morning light shining through her window and remember to pull kai out from her chest. During the night, kai snuggled into her chest to get warmer. With him away from the sunshine, she walked out of her room and thought about what to do today.

~I need to get kai back into school and have a doctor checkup on him.~ she thought as she started to make phone calls

The morning was turning to midmorning and kai was still sleeping as lu just finished her last call.

“Child services will help me, luke, and Helen to get kai back into school and the paperwork will be sent after he is at school. Kai’s appointment is at 1:00 in the afternoon three days from today and he will see Dr. Gardena, a gardevoir.” She said as she wrote down notes

“The judge I spoke with before I adopted kai said that I could have some people gather kai’s things while his mother was at work.” She said with a smile

“I’ll get some of my friends to get his things.” She added

Lu started to get things ready for breakfast as she heard kai finally waking up from his slumber and he went into his room to get ready for the day so he grabbed some clothes and hopped into the shower. She cooked breakfast for him like pancakes, eggs, bacon, and have a glass of milk and another glass of orange juice waiting for him as she was working on an orange for him.

“Good Morning, Sleepyhead.” She said and he slowly nodded

She finished peeling and cutting the orange for him and started eating her own breakfast. Soon he finished eating his food and fell back asleep; she just giggled at him.

~Must not be a morning person.~ she thought as she was drinking her coffee

She held her cup under his nose and he was awake again.

“Kai, I have some news for you.”

“What is it, lu?”

“You can go back to school and I have paperwork to do after you leave for school. You have an appointment with Dr.Gardena at the hospital where Helen works.” Lu explained

“The appointment is three days from today at 1 in the afternoon.” She added

“Ok.” He said

“We should get you some new clothes before you start going to school again.” She said as he smiled

Lu went to get ready for the day as kai was in his room waiting for lu to finish getting ready for their shopping trip.

~If mother comes after lu, I’ll fight her first before randore has a chance to deal with her.~ he thought with determination

~She will see what happens when I have someone to protect as a son.~

“Kai, I’m ready to go.” Lu said from the other side of the door

“Ok, lu.” Kai said opening the door

They were finishing up before leaving for the mall and kai was looking at the driveway after getting his shoes on.

“Kai, is there something wrong?” lu asked him after noticing him

“Lu, you’re the best mother I had even before the adoption and I love you; but if my mother comes after you I will fight her first.” Kai said as electricity was coming from his cheeks

“Kai, I love you too.” Lu said as they left the house for the mall
1111111111.title: In the morning

I've had it with this neighborhood's lack of common sense, I'm outta here."

Having his sights set on Prismopolis up north of the neighborhood, Julius spent the night inside his tent. Waking up bright and early in the morning, Julius packed up all of his things and began making the trip up towards the city, braving the forests to make his way up to the city limits; soon, upon making it to Prismopolis, he found a large "Here we are." Thought Julius, "Hmmm... six different sectors... too bad I'm only interested in three of them." Thoughts soon ran through his head.

"There's Amberland, where it's one gigantic amusement park. Sounds like fun!

"The Jade Light District, famous for the Jade Spire and a whole slew of other businesses."

"The Lavendar Sector is where those upperclassmen and the socialites go."

"Crimson County... passion, pit fightin'. and stiff competition. Sounds heavy!"

"Maize Domain... oh boy, not only is it just plain bizzare with weirdo magic running rampant, it's also a friggin' maze. How appropriate.

"Azure Quadrant must be where science reigns supreme. Not my idea for a fun time, really."

Having thought long and hard over omitting three city sectors to visit, he picked Jade Light District, Lavendar Sector, and Amberland. "Well... whichever I pick first, might as well do some sneakin' around while I'm there." Thought Julius, "They'll never know I was here... I hope." Gulping, Julius soon set foot into Prismopolis, getting near the telepad that would warp him inside any of the six sectors. "Well, no goin' back now." Thought Julius, closing his eyes, he pressed one of the three buttons. Shortly afterwards, energy enveloped him and sent him through a wormhole towards one of the six, vast, sprawling sectors of Prismopolis. Once he arrived, Julius had found himself in...

"that doesn't explain your speed" he said admiring him even more "the plasma in me makes my cells vibrate excessively in combat so I can move at the speed of sound and if I stress it light" he said as he held a soda in his hand "when did y-" he said as he threw him one and handed blade one "last thing" he said as he took a big gulp "if I say real easing seal 666 don't count on seeing one of me" he said as he nodded to blade "my name is blade" she said as she yawned a bit "I'm trained to use any bladed weapons and I have a weapons catch on me" she said as she took her cloak off to reveal a huge amount of strange markings "each weapon has a special property and I hold two that are very special" she said as a seal appeared next to her and a blade with a demonic sheath floated in place "this is the soul eating sword moramusa and on turn for using it the users vitality is taken but it can be sated by the blood of others"."And this" she said as a blue seal appeared and a highly technical sword in a oversized sheathe appeared "this sword was forged by me in with Leo in mind" she said as Leo looked on with pride "tis sword can cut through anything and is fueled by leos plasma based cells and vibrates at such a high frequency that other swords can only make contact for seconds before they snap under the stress. "you too are very impressive" Ryan said as the two nodded in approval "we were sent to help you by our superiors and we will follow your orders Ryan" Leo said "I hope we get along well" blade said as leos stomach growled "ummm any place we can get some food" Leo said as blaze giggled "high metabolism" she pointed out "Yea let's go" Ryan said as they went to get a bite.
1211111111.title: later

121111112.content:
"Sheesh, Marduk, can you believe all this? First, all this drama about some pikachu boy getting treated like garbage by his own mother, and now some group trying to kill him and his friends." Growled an arcanine man, having received a vision of what had just transpired, "Between you and me, I really need to get that little vision thingy outta my head before it drives me insane!" The cloaked mightyena boy himself shook his head with equal amount of disbelief.

"Come to think of it, Julius, there is this one man who goes by the name Ryan." Said Marduk, "Then again, I get the feeling that he'll be trying to spoil our fun when we go hunting for punks to beat up and whatnot. Let's say we head to Crimson County, there's always bound to have some great fights there." Julius' eyes lit up at the sound of going to Crimson County. "Sweet, I could really use someone to fight with." Smiled Julius, "This Ryan person, however... Is it just me or do I have that feeling that he might be a little too powerful? Either that, or too much of a killjoy?" Marduk rolled his eyes at the prospect of meeting Ryan. "Maybe both." Shrugged the cloaked mightyena man, continuing to walk on. As he walked through, he saw Kai and the gang just walking on by before looking at each other. "And that must be that pikachu boy I kept hearing about." Said Julius, shrugging. "Let's just move on, Julius. The Crimson County coliseum's calling our names."

Nodding, Julius began following Marduk as the two paid no attention to Kai and his pals, making a journey towards Prismopolis; Crimson County was the destination in the two battle-starved minds.
121111112.title: Julius and Marduk's Walkabout

131.content:
The wind is howling as the sky was covered in thunderstorms with lightning striking the ground and I’m gathering energy to blast my opponent into oblivion.

“I have somewhere to be after I kill you with this one hit.” I said as red energy surrounded my fist and I charged in for the kill

Our fight was to the death; but unlike me, my opponent doesn’t have a way to prevent death. He fell to the ground from my fatal strike and he missed my heart, but I have some battle wounds from the fight and they are healing as we speak.

“Alright, time for me to go see a jungle flower.” I said as I walked through a portal and the sky return to normal before the portal closed behind me

My name is Ryan and I was walking towards the other end of the portal I made. My eyes are black, short black hair, 5’10”, and wearing a black cloak over my clothes. I was just dealing with a pest that was causing trouble for me and I had to kill him. Soon I’m at the end of the portal and I’m looking through the portal to see a jungle.

“This is where I will meet the jungle flower.” I said as I was thinking of a plan

“My beast form will have to do here with my elemental powers and maybe my crystal power.” I was thinking aloud

“I have to help two people that will soon meet and their friends, but maybe I can help with the past.”

I walked into the jungle looking around thinking how beautiful this place is and I’m just leaning against the rock wall behind me as the night passes into day. Soon the morning light is shining on everything and I started to jump into the forest before jumping in the trees. As I’m running through the trees, a tigress with brilliant green eyes and long fire red hair, standing at 6’4”, and at the age of 17 is standing outside her cave ready for another day. ^It’s another day to hunt and work hard.^ the jungle girl said

Her name is rena, but in her tribe its ^Reenia^ and I can speak her language since I have knowledge of her tribe. She is quite the hunter and very able to handle herself, but I can sense that she is needs a friend and she will get more than that when I meet her then, another tiger would meet her. I’m coming to the cave as she just left and I went inside to look around to see what was inside. It took me some time before see everything, but I know she will smell my scent and I ran back into the jungle before she saw me.

“let’s see her react to my scent.” I said with a smile and I have a sweet fire rose in my hand

Soon the jungle girl gathered what she wanted to bring home and she stopped at the door of her cave.

^What is this scent?^ she thought as it was strange to her soon she found it all over her cave

^Whatever came into my home will be killed and I will kill it after I get what i want to know from it.^ she said and I was smiling before finding a place by the river

~Alright jungle girl, you got till about the time something comes get me~ I was thinking as an anaconda was coming towards me

My eyes changed to beast eyes and I was growling at the snake before transforming into my full beast form.

“You are making a very bad move snake.” I said to it

“You will make a very good meal pussy cat.” It said and I smiled darkly

I reverted back to my human form and stabbed the snake with an ice blade in the heart before I noticed my visitor watching the short fight and I look at the river.

^What are you?^ reenia had asked me and I don’t look at her or turn my head

^Just a person passing by.^ I said to her without looking at her and she is surprised to hear me speak her language

^How are you talking like me?^

^I have my own secrets to keep.^

^It must be hard to be the last one of your tribe.^

^How did you know?^

^I’m sorry for you losing your mother and the rest of your tribe.^ I said as I turned to see her with a sad smile

^I too lost someone dear to my heart.^

^Who did you lose?^

^…My mother…^

^A sickness killed her.^

^I know that seeing me is something weird, but I must ask you to forget me till you meet someone else. I will be around in the jungle and I won’t be far away to help you.^ I said and I walked up to her and I knocked her out by hitting a pressure point between her neck and shoulder

^You will not remember me and you will not find me.^ I said like a spell before taking her back her cave and I carried the snake as well

I hurried to her cave before laying her on her bed and putting the snake on the floor.

^You will wake up soon and find me gone.^ I said and I vanished into the jungle and away from the cave

~I have to watch over her and maybe use the time power to stop the flood or something like that.~ I thought
131.title: The first meeting

14.content:
It was raining one night where nando was out on the street running from trouble because he was there at the wrong place and the wrong time so the time was about 11:23 when he started to run. The weather is cold enough for him to see his breath and he is heavily dressed to stay warm. Nando is 13 years old with a strong built body from working out with his weights and his eyes is goldish-red with his hair is a blackish-brown, but his nature is like a strong, silent type with a sense of doing the right thing and the smart thing. For him, the smart thing is never the right thing and he goes to middle school.

He has two brothers and three sisters while their parents were very sweet and loving to them, but they are not over-protective of them and the kids are close so they look out for each other. His brother and sister, Aaron and Anne are the older ones since he is the third child born besides his younger brother, Jack was almost the youngest if the twin girls, Dorothy and Angel weren't born; they love each other very much so they can share anything without a fight.

Aaron watched over the twins with jack while anne stayed with nando because she was the motherly type to him. When one is feeling down, the others went to make them feel better and that is very sweet since their parents were working at their jobs; a tea shop owner and a bookstore owner.

Nando has a few friends outside of the family that treat him the same way and they are Robin, Sam, Trey, and Lily. They go over to his house to work on their homework each day because his friends liked his family better and they would spend the weekends at other houses to make it fair since they do homework at his house. His younger brother is 2 years while the twins are 3 years and the older ones are 5 and 6 years apart from him. Why he is running is because the bullies are typical in the schools and they always start trouble, but the teachers are trusting to nando because he does the right thing to do and he has always tryies to do the right thing.

Well, the bullies had done something to him so the teachers sent him to the principal for a talk without him being in trouble and he is feeling like everyone else who was sent to principal's office, but the main head made him feel better because she gave him something to drink with a snack. They talked for awhile he felt better and she wanted him to keep doing the right thing, but keep a special item with him just in case he is trouble so that leads to our current point in the story. The principal gave him a special necklace that she had since she was young and she wanted him to have because she liked him to be apart of her family in a matter of speaking. Nando is trying to hide from the bullies that he talked about because they should be punished and a girl saw him running so she is helping him till he can use the necklace.
14.title: Nando's story

141.content:
The girl's name is Rosa so they are running for some cover and he is thinking about the necklace that the principal gave him. They have bought themselves some time till they need to run again and the necklace started to glow so they see a portal opening up with a person walking out of it and the person is looking at the necklace.

He started to laugh till he saw a group of kids looking for them and he wanted them to walk with him because they will be watching him.

This person is tall, strong, like nando in a way except the look on his face like he dealt with this problem before and he is wearing a cloak with the hood covering his face. The bullies saw them so they ran to them except for the person that nando called and he wanted them to leave him alone or he will be forced to do something that he won't like to do. He pulled his cloak over the kids behind him because they could use it and the person is ryan kasshi because kagome is the principal at the school here.

Ryan doesn't have his powers because he sealed them away for good along with his power palm and he still knows martial arts from his friend, but he is just a wanderer now because his daughter has his job at the company and he can finally watch the real natural beauty in the world.

Ryan steps forward with his hands wearing his gloves and and he pulled out a jar with a small fire because he wanted to breath the last of it before the fight. He got his last smoke as the flamesmoke disappears into the air and he provoked the bullies toward him as his cloak protects the children from the fight. Ryan has stopped using mind games because there became ryan's trick and he started the already ended fight with several punches. He is still the same in his fights so they are on the ground in pain so he turned to the kids because they needed to get home soon so he walked them home while getting something for the bullies to stay warm and dry. Rosa and nando didn't know that ryan was watching them besides kagome told him about him with the bully problem.

As they are walking home, they started to talk about certain things and they will see each other at school and ryan is smiling because he is thinking about them. Nando wanted him to meet his family so he will when the time is right and he went to walk rosa home. Once she got inside, he started to walk through a door back home with a smile. Nando walked with his friends to school till he saw rosa walking up to him so he took her to meet his friends as they are walking to school and they are keeping it their little secret till their parents want to know about ryan. They saw the principal coming out of a house with a smile so they went to walk with her to school and she is thinking about ryan saving the two kids from the other kids, but she saw them walking toward her.
141.title: Here comes trouble

1411.content:
They walked over to her for a chat along the way so they can talk about what happened last night and this ryan person. Rosa and nando told her about the bullies that were chasing him so she helped him hide so he was focusing on the necklace when this ryan person came out of a portal thing in the air. Ryan was wearing a cloak when he was coming out to take a look at them before taking off his cloak to wrap them up. Then he pulled out a jar with a small flame inside and he breathed it into his body before beating the bullies up, but he was so fast that they couldn't see him. Kagome was smiling because he was still the same and she knows that he doesn't have his powers anymore.

Ryan made sure that the bullies were dry and warm so they won't freeze to death and he started to walk the two home while taking about certain things. Kagome looked around for something or someone watching them so they started walking to the school and she wanted them stay out of trouble like nando, but she she wanted nando and rosa to stay behind for a moment. The three walked into her office like nothing happened till they see something on her desk and it was from ryan. It was a note from saying about last night and he thinks the necklace has something special about it, but that is just a thought.

Kagome wanted to see necklace because she wandered that ryan sealed his powers into the necklace and nando gave her the necklace. She is looking at with a serious look on her face and they started to wander till she found something on it, but she told them go to class for now after giving them a note to explain why they were late.
1411.title: At school

14111.content:
Nando is in gym class which is his best class because he likes to stay fit and today they are playing dodgeball, but he still wearing the necklace and it vanished before the game started. Once the teams have been picked, he is waiting for the whistle and he is quick on his feet.

The game started with him running grabbing most of the balls and he were able to get a few people out of the game till he hid in the back.

When the game hit no boundaries, he trapped his prey which tried to hit him and he won the game. Ryan was watching the through a portal and he is very happy for him because he did the same thing as well.

Ryan sent the necklace back to nando and should get ready for his date the principal tonight. They will be walking around the town talking about moving here because this world is peaceful and giving the house to kari because she has his job now. Nando going to his next class which is math with some of his friends including rosa.

151.content:
A boy named Ryan is walking to get clear his mind of the depressed memories and he went to the open pet store that was on his block for some time. When he walked into the store, he saw cages, tanks, and rows of animals because he had enough money for four pets to be his family. While he was thinking about his family, something happened to make blackout and he shrunk to four inches. When he woke up, he was confused for a moment till he remembered that something made him shrink and he went looking for his new family. His first stop is the fantasy row to see a dragoness with red scales, a bright yellow belly and a huge tail that was as long as she was tall.

She was huge about 30 feet tall so they started to talk so he will be buying her soon and he gave her his word before leaving to find a hotel for anthros so he went inside to find multiple doors with names of animals. He went through the wolf door to see a number of giant wolves and they saw him so one of them with a smile greeted him, but they told him the same story that the dragoness told him. Ryan was looking the female wolf because she needs someone like him so he jumped over to her hand that she held out and they hugged before being lead out of the room.

They were about to leave when he saw something looking at him and he told her to go to the fox room for a female fox to join their family.

He picked out a fox that was the same age as the wolf and they are walking to the dragoness, but he let out the dragoness as they were following him. To the cat row where he saw a cat that she wanted to play with him like an older sister so he called over to the cage to push a button for someone to get her out of the cage because ryan is going home with his new family. When they were bought and they were outside of the store, the dragoness has her super power, which is size control plus her name is Radia and our kitty is Felicity so that leaves the wolf and the fox without names. He told Hope and Faith to ride on radia while he is riding on felicity and they started their way home with smiles on their faces. Well when they got home without causing any damage to the block and radia used her size control to fit inside his house while he was on his older sister waiting to get inside.

He told that has some things for them and he asked hope to help him to the closet in the master bedroom. She pulled out several outfits for her and faith, several items for felicity, and radia has her piece of home here with them. They went to put their stuff in their rooms and they went to make dinner because they will spend some time talking before going to sleep in their beds. Their meal was great because he was a great cook and he knew some meals that would fill any gut to the top. He wanted them to talk about themselves as an icebreaker before they can know him.

He is very happy not to be alone again so he told something about himself before jumping off the table and running to his room. They were happy that he bought them so they went to bed and felicity knew something was wrong with him so she went to sleep with him for the night. Ryan is dreaming about his family and being alone for the night until he felt something coming so he started to wake to see his sister curling around him.

He felt her warmth so he went back to sleep and started to see his new family. Their house has magic in it so he has to set the house to use it so he can spend time with them and he will do it in the morning after they finish their meal.
151.title: Going to the pet store

152.content:
Max is walking through a forest since he is the only human in the whole forest that is ruled over by a lioness with a kind heart and the animals in the forest are anthros. He was raised by his new family since he was thrown by his former family in a different world from a portal.

His family is different kinds of foxes, which is his favorite animal. His current family raised him like a cub and he has his own set of clothes. When he was a baby, he was alone while crying till the lioness who is called Lily found him and she knew what humans are so she took him to be taken care of by an old friend who became his mom.

Lily saw how max got into her forest so she saw his former family with cruel smiles and she felt bad for him. Lily is a monolith so her size about that size for a monolith and she can change her size, but she was human size for max.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---
"Hi there little guy." lily said as she picked baby max

"I know someone who will take good of you."

"Your old family didn't love you so I will make that won't happen again." she said as she carried him to a cave

Lily cuddled max till they got to the cave which has a family of foxes living in it and she is a snow fox which her name is snow. While they were walking to the cave, she played with him till got tired so he slept in her arms and she was singing him a song.

"This is your new home my little one."

"Hello snow."

"Well is about time you visit us and what is that in your arms."

"Its a baby human boy who thrown by his family and they had cruel smiles on their, but his name is max."

"I came to have you raise him like he is one of your cubs."

"Well that is a sad tale for this cute little guy and I will discuss it with the family before I give my answer."

"Please come in my friend." snow said as they walked in the cave

Snow's children are all girls so they are having fun till mom and her friend came in to see them, but they wanted to know what was in lily's arms.

"Children listen, lily came here with a human baby boy who was thrown by his hating family and she wanted me to raise him as my own cub which I ask you to give your opinion on this matter."

"Can we see him mom?" a red fox asked her mother

"Sure." snow said as she lowered max to them

"He is so cute." red said as the other kids nodded in agreement

Max then looked at red confused then he started to reach for her and she started to play with him. Snow and lily smiled because they knew that was a yes, but the other kids wanted to play with him as well.

"Well he is happy since foxes is favorite animal and I leave him in your care." lily said to snow before she leaves

Max looked at lily and she gave him a kiss farewell, but he had a thought in his mind about her and she smiled because she heard his thought.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---

Now max is about 15 years old in human years, but he doesn't act like an animal since he lives with them. He left the cave for a walk to clear his mind and his family wanted him to be on his own, but he can always count on them or the lioness who found him.

There is something special about him that only lily knows and he went to find her home which is in a cave in a mountain with a stone gate. During his walk, the day was clear and there was no trouble to be caused so it was peaceful. He heard something in the bushes so he stopped to wait what was coming and out comes a lioness who looked like the one who found him, but she was in trouble and they had the same looks of looking for the right lover. A tiger anthro came after the small lioness so max did the right thing which was protecting the lioness anthro.
152.title: Taking a walk through a jungle forest

1521.content:
"There you are my prey." the tiger anthro said she walked toward the lioness

"Leave her alone!" max said as he got in between them ready to protect the lioness

"Well it seem that I was right about coming here." a voice said as a portal opened with a man coming out

"Max, let me take care of this then three of us can go see the one who find you." the man said

"Who are you?" max asked him

"It doesn't who he is because I want her." the anthro tiger said before running toward them

"I don't think so!" the man yelled as he sent her flying with a punch to the stomach

"Wow, that was amazing!" the lioness said as they started to walk toward the man who fell to the ground

"You alright?" max asked the man

"I'm fine just alittle tired, but that single punch sure did the trick." the man said

"Well we need to get my mom to look at him." the lioness anthro said

"But I don't know your name." max said

"My name is lyla."

"Max."

"My name is ryan." said the man

"We need to hurry." ryan said as they carried him to lyla's home

"Mom!, mom!" her daughter called her

After afew minutes, they hear footsteps and lyla's mom saw them and they started talking about what just happened.
1521.title: A short fight

15211.content:
"So she came after you?" lily asked her daughter

"Yes mother, but ryan saved me."

"No, max protected you and I justed help out." ryan said

"Besides I need to get back to my training." he added

"No you need to rest then you start training with my mom." lyla said

"She is right."

"Fine."

"Now then I think that we should go inside for a chat before something else happens." lily said as she picks them up

After lily took them inside, she put them on the floor before shrinking to her human size.

"So max how you been?" lily asked him

"Do I know you?" he asked confused

"Do you not remember me?"

"You were the one who found me when I was a baby and I had dreams about you."

"Well what kind of dreams?" she asked with interest

"Before it goes that far, the kids should get to know each other while you are helping me recover." ryan said with a stern voice
15211.title: Later

152111.content:
"So you had dreams about my mother." lyla said with a smile

"What kind of dreams?" she asked

"She found me when I was a baby and gave me to my fox mother who was an old friend, but I thought that she my mother so I would dream about her every night." max answered

As those two were talking, ryan and lily were helping him train after he rested for several hours.

"So your strength has no limit unless you hold back." lily said she was on ryan's back as he was exercising

"When I started training, the first thing was that control is everything." ryan said

"How strong are you?" lily asked as she was growing bigger to give more of a challenge

"Normally I'm superhuman, but add my powers which puts my power at insane levels and my feelings only add to that power." he explained

"I need to know something." lily said

"As do I." ryan agreed

"Why did you came here?" lily asked as she got off him before picking him up

"I came here because my beast state told me and I'm guessing that max has a beast form so I came here to train him." ryan answered while showing his beast crest

"So a beast king came to train a future king." lily said

"I have seen his former family from the shadows before I came here and it seems that some of his former family misses him." he said with a dark look on his face

"Why would they drop him here and how did they find this place?" lily asked getting angry

"That I don't know and it won't help if you are mad like this." ryan said

"Who misses max?"

"His sisters, younger brothers, and mother."

"How big is the family?"

"Like snow's family, but abit smaller."

"Two parents, three older sisters, four older brothers, six younger sisters, and two younger brothers." ryan added

"When you said sisters, you mean both older and younger."

"That is right, but his father and older brothers came from an different wife and mother."

"What about your question ryan?" lily asked

"That will be for another day in the morning so we need to get something to eat." ryan said
152111.title: At night

1521111.content:
Lily went to get them something to eat as max with lyla were under the stars talking about their childhood and they started to kiss.

"That was amazing." max said

"I agree with you max." lyla said

"We should start to walk back home and mom would let you stay with us." she added before getting up

"All right and we should be careful because ryan isn't here." max said

"But I have you." lyla said with a smile

They got onto their way as they were being watched and max felt someone is watching them.

"Hey someone is watching us and I have a feeling that they aren't friendly." max said looking around

"Well it seems that the kids stayed out late to watch the stars and share a kiss." someone said from the shadows

"Who is there? max asked

"That man won't bother us since he is sleeping now." the tigress said

"You are not touching her." max said feeling his anger raising

"What can you do?" she asked with a smirk grin

"Protect her from you." he answered

She jumped them, but max pushed lyla out of the way and he blocked the attack.

"Good thing that my family help me with defending myself." max said

"You never learn do you?" ryan asked as he just appeared

"Ryan stay out of this because I want to fight her without help." max said with a smile

"I understand max and lyla watch him for something unusual." ryan said

Max got into his fighting fox stance and waited for the tigress to make the first move.

~He is fighting like a fox while having the spirit of the lion.~ ryan thought
1521111.title: Fight night round 2

15211111.content:
Max and the tigress started their fight as ryan is watching with a smile because max and his beast are fighting as one.

"As I said before, you will not touch lyla." max said as he was getting ready for another round

"Try to stop me." the tigress said as they started another round

They started another round, but max was beating her at every turn and he sent her flying through the night sky.

"Very well done max." ryan said

"How did I do that?" he asked

"Your family training and your animal spirit of your heart." ryan said as they started walking

"You fight like a fox, but have the soul of a lion." ryan added

"Your mother was getting us something to eat after I was training and she was asleep when I left to see you two with her." he said

"My training with your mother was me doing pushups with her on me growing her size for weight training." he said as they got close to their home

"Max, your training will start tomorrow when you want to learn about your animal spirit." he before heading back to bed with lyla's mother

"You can sleep with me." lyla said to max

They went to her room and they found the bed after moving through a path.

"We can share the bed till tomorrow when you go back to your family, max." lyla said to him

"That can wait till morning." he said as they went to bed for the night
15211111.title: Later

A bunch of storylines form different stories can be found here and I can welcome you to add chapters, rate, and review.

Rules:

Long, spaced out chapters.
No cursing or swearing.
Keep it clean.
Good gamar and spelling.
Have fun.

I will edit chapters, but deletion will only be a last resort.
Thanks for listening.
